entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dome Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:17 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Windy. High minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 26.

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 29. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
